mapper.update: update users set User_name = #{User_name},Tel = #{Tel},Email = #{Email} where User_id=#{User_id};
update questions set Question_status='accepted' where Question_id=#{questionID};
update users u set u.Task_num=u.Task_num+1 where User_id=#{User_id};
update questions set Question_status='done' where Question_id=#{questionID};
update users u set u.Task_num=u.Task_num-1 where User_id=#{User_id};
mapper.select: select * from questions where User_id = #{User_id} and Question_status = 'unaccepted';
select * from questions q, maintenance m where q.User_id=m.User_id and q.User_id = #{User_id} and q.Question_status = 'accepted' group by q.Question_id;
select * from questions where User_id = #{User_id} and Question_status = 'done';
select q.User_id from items i,questions q where i.Item_id=q.Item_id and i.User_id=#{User_id} and i.Item_id=#{Item_id} group by q.User_id;
